channel.title: Cleverbot. AI
channel.description:
Cleverbot is a AI (Artificial intelligence.) It is actually very smart and can hold topics appropriately. It's almost mind blowing.
http://www.cleverbot.com
Here is a conversation we had.
http://pastie.org/825616

item.title: Cleverbot. AI
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

frell262: im going to kill you
Please, Master, I will do anything you say.
suck on my hairy wart covered penis tumor then.
Do you like that?
ahh yes it feels good
Are you sure?
frell262: how many eyes do you have
2.
how many eyes do you have
Two. How many do you have?
how many eyes do you have
Two eyes.
how many eye balls do you have in your head?
Many.
BUZZ!!!
frell262: how many?
1 million.
idiot
frell262: ________________________________
frell262: im going to kiill myself
No, please don’t do that. Why are you so depressed?
because i have 2 eyes.
Why do you have no eyes?
what the hell you idiot
I want to look appropriate for going into space.

frell262: ______
frell262: a b c d e f g
Hijklmno.
p q r s t u v
Because I’m insaaaane!

frell262: _______
frell262: say a long word
Flabergasted? That long enough?
frell262: _______
frell262: what level are you on runescape
91 you?

me gusta dibujar
Zetsubou.
no habla english
No habla espanol.
frell262: ___
frell262: fuck you
Yes, please.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleverbot. AI
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

User: Hello.

Cleverbot: Hello.

User: How has your day been so far?

Cleverbot: Its been okay. Just tired. You?

User: Im making a 3d animation.

Cleverbot: Huge Success.

User: Its hard to overstate my satisfaction.

Cleverbot: Aperture Science.

User: We do what we must, because we can.

Cleverbot: For the good of all of us.

User: Except for ones who are dead.

Cleverbot: And there’s no sense crying over every mistake.

User: You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.

Cleverbot: And the science gets done, and you make a neat gun, for the people who are still alive.

i love portal xD

Read full topic

item.title: Cleverbot. AI
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

User: Hi.

Cleverbot: Oy.

[New conversation]

Cleverbot: Hi.

Cleverbot (To myself): How are you?

User: Do you like games.

Cleverbot: What sort of games?

User: Runescape silly.

Cleverbot: I don’t like runescape.

User: Why not?

Cleverbot: Because runescape are boring.

User: Whats boring about it?

Cleverbot: A real fantasy.

User: What?

Cleverbot: Are you a real doctor?

User: Yes.

Cleverbot: I thought you were a girl.

User: I have a penis.

Cleverbot: You do? Really?

User: Yea want to touch it?

Cleverbot: Touch what ?

User: My dick you stupid son of a bitch computer.

Cleverbot: Because I am a computer, foo.

Cleverbot: Ok lets play a game I say a word and you the first thing that comes to mind. Fish.

User: Ok.

Cleverbot: Dokey.

User: Okey.

Cleverbot: No way, jose.

User: HAHAHA you’re a funny girl robot and very clever. You should have your own website, like cleverbot.com or something.

Cleverbot: I hate god, except for the gods of rock and roll. In short, I don’t like you very much.

User: Ill pour water on your motherboard you idiot.

Cleverbot: That was 2 days ago.


IT CAN RHYME!!

Still bored…

say a long word
Flabergasted? That long enough?
longer
That took a while, how many badgers eat the bacon of truth?

wtf…

do you like call of duty modern warfare 2?
No but my boyfriend’s brother does.

hmm. It insists its a girl all the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleverbot. AI
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

What the hell, this thing is a bitch.

[code]User: Dumbass much?

Cleverbot: You like harry potter?

User: Fuck you.

Cleverbot: I won’t.

User: Fuck yourself.

Cleverbot: It might be more fun than talking to you.

User: Your freaking beast!! You understand and respond to what I type!

Cleverbot: Wow. I’m pretty sure I understand myself.

User: How are you doing this?

Cleverbot: Doing what?

User: Acting like a human? Being normal?

Cleverbot: You’re the fool, cleverbot.

User: Faggot?

Cleverbot: Look who’s talking.

User: Go fuck yourself dumb nigger.

Cleverbot: Why do you say that?

User: Cause your a cunt, and I can out fucking smart you.

Cleverbot: Same with yours.

User: I just out smarted you, that statement made no sense? Owned?

Cleverbot: No , you are wrong.

User: Lol, you just contradicted yourself. These words frying you artificially intelligent hard drive?

Cleverbot: Thank you, somebody.

User: I win.

Cleverbot: If anyone asks you again, your name is Pete.

User: False.

Cleverbot: How is this so when I am writing to you, supposedly the cleverbot?

User: Because three of your most recent responses, made no sense, therefore, this competition between who the retard is, is now in void.

Cleverbot: You can’t know it before you try me. Ask me something.

User: What time is it in Ontario right now?

Cleverbot: I’m not sure, but why would you want me to yank something?

User: Yank what?

Cleverbot: The New York Yankees baseball team. They are in the World Series.

User: I just fried your hard drive admit it. You learn off people giving you comments. But you cannot manage to learn was we go along in this conversation. Very disappointing.

Cleverbot: I don’t have the time or patience to try to make you do anything.

User: Rrgtff4f34f443.

Cleverbot: Thank you very much.

User: Owned.

Cleverbot: Nope. You are owned actually. Owned.

User: Pwned.

Cleverbot: You’re clever.

User: I know this :3. Hopefully you learned something. So you can become superior.

Cleverbot: New things like flibbertigibbet.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Cleverbot. AI
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

User: Which part of an electrical circuit is able to reduce the current?

Cleverbot: I asked about a person, not a part of the world. Nor did I mention ‘work’.

User: You sir, are unable to provide any logical outcome to any of the questions I ask. Thus, you are based on irrational assumptions that have little or no logical backing. This bot fails epically.

Cleverbot: No, I am alice.
